content: I think I'll take the plunge and get a fiddle leaf fig. I've always loved their unique shape and I'm willing to put in the extra care to make it thrive. Since I already have a snake plant, I think the two will complement each other nicely. Now, I'm also thinking of adding some wall art to my living room. I recently ordered some prints from Society6, but I'm not sure how to arrange them on the wall. Do you have any tips on how to create a visually appealing gallery wall?
